on_entry: /tellraw @s {"rawtext":[{"text":"You don't have enough energy to perform this action!"}]}
/tellraw @s {"rawtext":[{"text":"You don't have enough energy to perform this action!"}]}
/tellraw @s {"rawtext":[{"text":"You don't have enough energy to perform this action!"}]}
/tellraw @s {"rawtext":[{"text":"You don't have enough energy to perform this action!"}]}

on_exit: /tellraw @s {"rawtext":[{"text":"To use your focus attack, press and hold jump to charge up energy, then release for massive damage!"}]}

/execute as @e[type=rift:apatosaurus, c=1, tag=tamed, tag=!baby] positioned as @e[type=rift:apatosaurus, c=1, tag=tamed, tag=!baby] run summon rift:apatosaurus_tail_whip ~ ~ ~

on_exit: /tellraw @s {"rawtext":[{"text":"To use bulldoze, press and hold jump!"}]}

/tag @e[type=rift:saurophaganax, c=1, tag=tamed, tag=!baby, scores={saurophLightBlst=10}] add saurophaganaxLightBlast

/execute as @e[type=rift:saurophaganax, c=1, tag=tamed, tag=!baby, scores={saurophLightBlst=!10}] run tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"You need to use the Saurophaganax's Bite attack on 10 monsters/bugs to use this!"}]}

/execute as @e[x=~-24, dx=48, y=~-4, dy=20, z=~-24, dz=48, c=16, type=!xp_orb, type=!player, type=!item, tag=!tamed, family=!inanimate] positioned as @e[x=~-24, dx=48, y=~-4, dy=20, z=~-24, dz=48, c=16, type=!xp_orb, type=!player, type=!item, tag=!tamed, family=!inanimate] run summon rift:direwolf_alert_icon 
/execute as @e[type=rift:direwolf, c=1, tag=tamed, tag=!baby] run effect @e[type=!player, tag=!tamed, family=!inanimate, r=16] weakness 90
/execute as @e[type=rift:direwolf, c=1, tag=tamed, tag=!baby] run tag @e remove sniffedByDirewolf

/execute as @e[x=~-48, dx=96, y=~-4, dy=20, z=~-48, dz=96, c=16, type=!xp_orb, type=!player, type=!item, tag=!tamed, family=!inanimate] positioned as @e[x=~-48, dx=96, y=~-4, dy=20, z=~-48, dz=96, c=16, type=!xp_orb, type=!player, type=!item, tag=!tamed, family=!inanimate] run summon rift:direwolf_alert_icon 
/execute as @e[type=rift:direwolf, c=1, tag=tamed, tag=!baby] run effect @e[type=!player, tag=!tamed, family=!inanimate, r=16] weakness 30 1
/tellraw @s {"rawtext":[{"text":"You don't have enough energy to perform this action!"}]}
/tellraw @s {"rawtext":[{"text":"You don't have enough energy to perform this action!"}]}
